name: Tank Attack (Darryl Bartlett)
overview: A shoot'em up created by Darryl Bartlett with the help of the SEUCK in 1989. In it, one to two players take on a futuristic city battle, avoiding turrets and blowing up the multitude of other tanks that will try to take you out. Get a friend, you're going to need all the help you can get to avoid being blasted to smithereens.
